# NOTE: This file is generated by yotta: changes will be overwritten!

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.11)

include_directories("/Users/emorgan/GitHub/uBit_neopixel/source")


set(YOTTA_AUTO_UBIT-NEOPIXEL_CPP_FILES
    "/Users/emorgan/GitHub/uBit_neopixel/source/uBit_neopixel.cpp"
)
# force dependency on the config header for cpp files, which CMake otherwise wouldn't track:
set_property(SOURCE ${YOTTA_AUTO_UBIT-NEOPIXEL_CPP_FILES} PROPERTY OBJECT_DEPENDS "/Users/emorgan/GitHub/uBit_neopixel/build/bbc-microbit-classic-gcc/yotta_config.h")
set(YOTTA_AUTO_UBIT-NEOPIXEL_HEADER_FILES
    "/Users/emorgan/GitHub/uBit_neopixel/ubit-neopixel/uBit_neopixel.h"
)
# force dependency on the config header for header files, which CMake otherwise wouldn't track:
set_property(SOURCE ${YOTTA_AUTO_UBIT-NEOPIXEL_HEADER_FILES} PROPERTY OBJECT_DEPENDS "/Users/emorgan/GitHub/uBit_neopixel/build/bbc-microbit-classic-gcc/yotta_config.h")


add_library(ubit-neopixel
    ${YOTTA_AUTO_UBIT-NEOPIXEL_CPP_FILES}
    ${YOTTA_AUTO_UBIT-NEOPIXEL_HEADER_FILES}
)

yotta_postprocess_target(LIBRARY ubit-neopixel)



target_link_libraries(ubit-neopixel
    nrf51-sdk
)
